title: [Self-directed] Learning Theory-Based Pedagogical Approaches to Enhance e-Learning Course Design Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and fundamental proficiency in digital device usage
context.additional_context: Customized Science Curriculum Design for Professionals in Smartphone-Only Environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain e-learning content design principles based on learning theories (e.g., constructivism, behaviorism).
Learners can design educational activity sequences to achieve learning objectives in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can develop feedback mechanisms suitable for project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
